data.actual_result: We can't update our user permissions, even if we are the owner.
data.expected_result: We can update our user permissions if we are the owner.
data.short_description: We can't edit our user permissions (in a channel), even if we are the owner.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a server where you are owner. - Edit permissions of a channel. - Add a new Member > you - Add a permissions (no matter)
